description: Reinvent your approach to salmon with this barbecue-friendly approach, pairing a fish fillet with a zesty salsa verde and grilled lemon halves.
name: Salmon With Salsa Verde Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.6 cup extra virgin olive oil, plus 1 tbs extra

recipeInstructions.text: Place parsley, coriander, chives, dill, capers, garlic and fennel in a food processor. Process until finely chopped. Add cup oil. Juice 1 lemon then add the juice. Process until combined. Stir in olives.

Meanwhile, preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over mediumhigh heat. Brush salmon with extra oil. Grill salmon, skin-side down, for 8 minutes. Turn, grill for 5 minutes more for medium-rare or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a serving plate. Cover with foil. Rest for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, cut remaining lemons in half. Place on grill cut sidedown and grill for 2 minutes or until lightly charred. Drizzle salmon with salsa verde and serve with charred lemon.
